nodes.bodyText:
You adapted the check to test explicit of ~ not found, but no of this tests here has a case where a tilde exists.
Can you add such a test?

Not sure if this should go into the uyuni release which is currently prepared.
If yes, please change the number of the script as we already have a 100-... .
If not, you need to change the directory as it will be released for 4.2.1-to-4.2.2
You are right - this time I deducted the right dir but I was not considering the release. Adjusting with the nextver dir.

@mcalmer I'd say 4.2.0-to-4.2.1. The current spec on master is '4.2.0' and I still didn't tag for the Uyuni 2020.09 release.
What am I missing?

Maybe you were thinking about the CVE? We'll not do a full release for that. Instead we'll release a set of packages to be installed on top of Uyuni 2020.07: https://github.com/uyuni-project/uyuni/wiki/Releasing-Uyuni-patches
This is nothing we are going to do frequently at all, but I created the mechanism for important situations such as this CVE.
